name: Harold Tales - The Final Chapter
description:
You CanNOt JuST pLAce the TxT fiLE reCKLesS lY.

iT wonT wORk UnlESS u… seND iT to tHE www fOLder…

WHO IS TALKING RIGHT NOW?! HUH…. IS IT MY IMAGINATION? OR COULD IT BE THAT YOU’RE TRYING TO GIVE THEM A HINT?

NO MATTER. THERE IS NO HOPE FOR THEM TO RETURN TO YOU.

DESPAIR AS WE MEET OUR END, FOR THE FINAL FANTASY WE WILL EVER MAKE IN THIS HAROLDVERSE!

Zak….. HeL…P…. Me…..

----------------

Controls

Z/Enter - Select

X/Esc - Cancel

Arrow Keys = Move
